title: Audiovisual Vocabulary Curriculum Utilizing Active Response Error Correction

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental literacy skills and understanding of job-related basic terminology
context.additional_context: Vocabulary education focused on social studies domains for practicing professionals, emphasizing smartphone-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and pronounce social studies domain-specific vocabulary with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners demonstrate a 75% or higher improvement in accuracy after error correction procedures
Learners can utilize at least 60% of acquired vocabulary in new sentence contexts during training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
